channel.title: Sports

item.title: Steelers WR DK Metcalf's Suspension Upheld, $45M Future Guaranteed Money Voided
item.description: Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin declined to comment on the matter involving DK Metcalf following Sunday's win.

item.title: 2025 NFL MVP Stock Watch: Christian McCaffrey is Putting Up Monster Yards Again
item.description: Christian McCaffrey deserves consideration for an award other than Comeback Player of the Year as he's setting record and helping the 49ers win games.

item.title: Koepka leaving LIV Golf, cites family reasons
item.description: Five-time major champion Brooks Koepka is stepping away from LIV Golf, effective immediately, his representatives said Tuesday.

item.title: Metcalf's 2-game ban upheld, will forfeit $555K
item.description: The NFL upheld DK Metcalf's two-game suspension for his altercation with a fan in Detroit on Sunday.
